description: Number of 2-diregular connected digraphs with n nodes.
references: M. V. S. Ramanath; T. R. Walsh, Enumeration and generation of a class of regular digraphs, J. Graph Theory 11 (1987), no. 4, 471-479.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
